description:
Plunder powder with the Marauder's wide field of view and fog-defeating ventilation. All styles include a bonus lens, so you can scope the perfect line in any conditions.

  • Fits medium to larger faces best
  • SPY HD+ lenses heighten contrast and colour without effecting clarity
  • Cylindrical lenses provide crisp detail edge-to-edge
  • Anti-fog injected SIC™ (Superior Injected Curve) double-layered thermal lenses have anti-fog and anti-scratch protection
  • Deadbolt™ lens change system uses the power of magnets for proper alignment and a simple locking lever to keep everything in place, making lens changes easy, even while wearing gloves
  • Flexible polyurethane frame conforms to any face for a comfortable fit
  • RISE ventilation system helps keep fog at bay
  • Triple layer IsotronTM face foam is 3 different densities and features moisture wicking Dri-ForceTM fleece
  • Silicone ribbed strap won't slip
  • Black and Onyx colourways includes a spare low-light HD+ persimmon lens with silver spectra with 46% visible light transmission
  • Matte black colourway includes a spare low-light HD+ gray green with red spectra lens with 54% visible light transmission
name: Spy+ Marauder Snow Goggles - Unisex
